definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
Lake Michigan, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]

sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州连续两年贫困率攀升具有统计学意义。

sentences.english: It is called Bronner's CHRISTmas Wonderland in Frankenmuth, Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 它就是密歇根州法兰克幕斯城的布朗纳圣诞乐园。

sentences.english: So far eight people have died from flooding in Michigan and Indiana.
sentences.chinese: 至今密歇根州和印第安纳州已有八人因洪水丧生。
密歇根克雷格斯名单的故事。

sentences.english: He's the Dean of Admissions for the University of Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 他是密歇根大学档招生办主任。

sentences.english: The Chicago waterways also have other access points to Lake Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥水道还有其他密歇根湖的进入点。

sentences.english: No Asian carp have yet been found in Lake Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖还尚未发现亚洲鲤鱼的踪迹。

sentences.english: Pretty soon after studying some time in the university of Michigan Madonna wanted to go to New York to chase her dreams.
sentences.chinese: 在密歇根州立大学学习不久，麦当娜想到纽约寻梦。

sentences.english: Let's say you purchase a worn-out 100-acre farm in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 比如说你在密歇根购买了一块100英亩荒废的农田。

sentences.english: If I make my own decision, I might choose Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 如果我自己作决定的话，我可能选择密歇根。

sentences.english: Chicago sits next to Lake Michigan, one of North America's Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥坐落在北美五大湖之一密歇根湖畔。

sentences.english: "Let me be clear, we are not letting our guard down in Michigan in any way whatsoever," Gettelfinger said.
sentences.chinese: 说明白点，我们无论如何都不会在密歇根州有所松懈。

sentences.english: The best part of living in Northern Michigan is the changing seasons.
sentences.chinese: 住在北密歇根最棒的事要数换季了。

sentences.english: Michigan: a state in the northeastern US; capital, Lansing.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根，美国北部一州，首府兰辛。

sentences.english: Count evolutionary biologist Jianzhi Zhang of the University of Michigan among the skeptical.
sentences.chinese: 美国密歇根大学进化生物学家张建志就是质疑者之一。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
